Today, I chaired a meeting of the Council of Ministers in Fujairah Castle, Fujairah. I wanted to change the meeting place to send two messages http://t.co/9OhMDWT5u2
The UAE is one unit .. The Council of Ministers will hold its meetings in any spot to be close to all citizens in it .. http://t.co/Aq6mVbNV0Y
The second message of the new generations is that the age of the UAE is not only 43 years old. This fortress is part of the history of the UAE and is more than 500 years old.

During the Fujairah Castle meeting, we adopted a series of steps to implement the directives of the President of the State, may God protect him, by proclaiming 2015 the year of innovation in the country
Sheikh Khalifa's directives to declare 2015 as a year of innovation come to stimulate efforts, energies and resources to make the UAE one of the first countries in the innovation sector
We need to stimulate innovation in our youth, create stimulating environments in our society, and push our sectors to explore new areas for the development of our economy.
I look forward to welcoming you @ashrafghani and @DrAAbdullah to Brussels for historical meeting.

The cabinet approved a set of steps to implement President HH Sheikh Khalifa's directive to make 2015 a year of innovation in the UAE.
Under the direction of Sheikh Khalifa, we will devote all efforts, and resources to making the UAE one of the most innovative countries

Today marks the end of my mandate as European Council President. Thank you for following me during the past years. #EUCO
As of today, I will hand over this Twitter account to my successor Donald Tusk, who will continue to tweet here as @eucopresident.
Congratulations to my good friend @donaldtusk RT @EUCouncil: Today, Donald #Tusk Becomes President of the European Council #EUCO
As I leave Twitter, you can continue to follow me through my Facebook page: http://t.co/FCvtBztEz3.
Good morning! As I start in my new role as President of the European Council, I look forward to engaging with you here on Twitter.
From time to time, I will continue to post on @donaldtusk. My spokesperson Preben Aamann is also on Twitter, please follow him @PrebenEUspox
You can read more on my role and find my other social media accounts on my website: http://t.co/w8huSfkq7J. #EUCO
@EUonGoogle I am! Have a look at https://t.co/w9dRm0YJIh.
I was honored today with the awarding of 43 Emirati figures to the UAE's first medal. Our first two are Zayed and Rashid Taibullah Tharhama http://t.co/w3qwGXN1nm

We are a people that does not accept the first place .. We learned from Zayed and Rashid that glory to those who ask .. And the summit of those who seek .. The first centers of those who do not accept others
We are delighted by the size of the participation of our people in the nominations of the early UAE .. With this passion the UAE will realize its ambitions and build its future http://t.co/hQzsQ9S9a5
Every human being has an energy and a miracle. He shows with determination and determination and achieves his first place .. http://t.co/J8Bbi8z3BJ
We wanted to present models and gifts to generations of the UAE to know that the road to the first centers requires patience, diligence, perseverance and determination. Http://t.co/xDVh1o2iNr

On my first day as President of the European Council, I would like to thank my predecessor Herman Van Rompuy- a tough act to follow.
Van Rompuy helped steer Europe out of the storm. He personifies principles also important to me: trust, common sense, moderation, decency.
I also thank @EUCouncil staff for the great job they have done supporting Herman Van Rompuy, and look forward to working with them.
I come here with a strong sense of purpose. In these difficult times Europe needs success. To me, this means four things. (1/5)
First, protecting our fundamental values, freedom and solidarity, against threats to the EU & its unity- both from inside & outside.
@eucopresident: Second, we need ruthless determination to end the economic crisis. It is our responsibility to complete the genuine #EMU.
Third, the EU must be strong internationally. Europe has to secure its borders, support those in neighbourhood who share our values.
RT @_Jadranka_Kosor: Victory in the Homeland War is built into the Constitution, in the Source Basis. There is no need to get pressured by the presidential ...
Fourth, relations between Europe & the United States are the backbone of the community of democracies. The year ahead will be crucial.
